summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of West Forty-first Street and West Forty-second Street, from Third Avenue Northwest to Sixteen and Northwest et al, in the City of Seattle, by laying watermain under Ordinance No. 14965 creating Local Improvement District No. 1319 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
